name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WebBrush - Web Paint Tool for Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Draw on Web Pages with Advanced Web Paint Tool for Chrome, Custom Colors, Seamless Undo/Redo, and Easy Save & Copy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 WebBrush Web Paint Tool: Your Canvas, Your Way! 🎨

Enhance your web browsing experience with WebBrush Web Paint Tool, the ultimate browser extension that puts the power of creative expression at your fingertips.

✨ Key Features:

▸ DRAW ON ANY PAGE: Instantly turn any webpage into your artistic Web Paint canvas.
▸ Drawing Tools: Explore a diverse array of brushes, pens, and pencils for unparalleled creative expression. 🖌️🎨
▸ Color Palette: Personalize your drawings with a customizable palette, making each creation uniquely yours. 🌈
▸ Undo/Redo: Seamlessly control your artistic journey with easy correction and experimentation. ↩️🔄
▸ Text Annotations: Add context and personal flair by placing text directly on the web page, enriching your annotations. 📝
▸ Save & Copy: Effortlessly preserve and share your masterpieces with intuitive save or copy options. 💾📋

Unlock a new dimension of interaction with Web Paint tool. Download WebBrush Web Paint Tool now and let your creativity flow seamlessly on the web! 🚀✨
